text:
"Touch Me Not" is a 2018 internationally co-produced drama movie. It was screened in the main competition under the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. It won the Golden Bear Award. The movie mixes fiction and documentary.
"Touch Me Not" is rated NC-17 because of explicit sex.
Under Rotten Tomatoes, the movie has a rating of 58% with 33 reviews. Under Metacritic, the movie has a rating of 65 out of 100, meaning "generally favorable reviews".
